paragraphs.title: Most Influential Users By Like Graph

paragraphs.text:
// likeProducer :: likeConsumer
val likesDF = sqlContext.read
  .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
  .option("header", "false") 
  .option("inferSchema", "true") 
  .load("/root/pipeline/datasets/graph/likes.csv")
  .toDF("userId", "itemId", "rating")
  
// id :: userName
val usersDF = sqlContext.read
  .format("com.databricks.spark.csv")
  .option("header", "false") 
  .option("inferSchema", "true") 
  .load("/root/pipeline/datasets/graph/users.csv")
  .toDF("id", "name")

result.msg:
likesDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [userId: int, itemId: int, rating: int]
usersDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: int, name: string]

paragraphs.title: Run PageRank On The Like Graph Data

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.graphx._
import org.apache.spark.graphx.util._
edgeTuples: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[(Long, Long)] = MapPartitionsRDD[909] at map at <console>:73
graph: org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph[String,Int] = org.apache.spark.graphx.impl.GraphImpl@59bb2e24
convergenceThreshold: Double = 0.01
pageRank: org.apache.spark.graphx.Graph[Double,Double] = org.apache.spark.graphx.impl.GraphImpl@21520f06
topInfluencers: Array[(org.apache.spark.graphx.VertexId, Double)] = Array((90006,0.31452387499999995), (10004,0.292375), (90001,0.250773875), (10005,0.2245875), (10002,0.2177875), (10003,0.2177875), (90003,0.21375), (90004,0.187023875), (90005,0.187023875), (90002,0.187023875))

paragraphs.title: Enrich the Top Influencers with reference data
